setting.label: Show channel logos on OSD Mini EPG
Show channel numbers on OSD Mini EPG
Disabling MediaCodec(Surface) hardware acceleration for OSD
may fix video stuttering in Kodi System -> Video -> Acceleration
[COLOR=gold]Delete[/COLOR] all saved stream selections for all channels
[COLOR=gold]Reset[/COLOR] individual TV Guide files (Choose what to reset..)
[COLOR=gold]Add[/COLOR] players to [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] (Do this after installing a video addon)
[COLOR=gold]Backup[/COLOR] settings to zip for other devices
[COLOR=gold]Add[/COLOR] extra players to plugin.video.meta (enable afterwards in settings)
[COLOR=gold]Check account status[/COLOR][COLOR red] **press ok to save before checking status**[/COLOR]
Enable [COLOR red]Over The Top[COLOR white] TV[/COLOR]
Enable All Free Addons *ONLY ENABLE IF YOU HAVE ALL INSTALLED*
